title: Awesome List Updates on Dec 13, 2021
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Dec 13, 2021 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Ros2
items.content_text:
### Packages / Containerization

*   [ros2-docker](https://husarnet.com/blog/ros2-docker) - Connecting ROS 2 nodes running in Docker containers over the internet.

### Packages / Networking

*   [Husarnet VPN (⭐343)](https://github.com/husarnet/husarnet) - A P2P, secure network layer dedicated for ROS & ROS 2. ![husarnet](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/husarnet/husarnet.svg)

### Companies / Robotics Capture the Flag (RCTF)

*   [Husarnet](https://husarnet.com) - Open Source, P2P, low-latency VPN dedicated for robots.
items.content_html:
Packages / Containerization

  • ros2-docker - Connecting ROS 2 nodes running in Docker containers over the internet.

Packages / Networking

  • Husarnet VPN (⭐343) - A P2P, secure network layer dedicated for ROS & ROS 2.

Companies / Robotics Capture the Flag (RCTF)

  • Husarnet - Open Source, P2P, low-latency VPN dedicated for robots.

items.title: Awesome Terraform
items.content_text:
### Tools / Community providers

*   [terraform-credentials-vault (⭐5)](https://github.com/oulman/terraform-credentials-vault) - A Terraform "credentials helper" plugin that allows providing credentials for Terraform-native services (private module registries, Terraform Cloud, etc) via environment variables.
*   [terrastate (⭐78)](https://github.com/rohinivsenthil/terrastate) - Visual Studio Code extension to monitor/deploy/destroy Terraform resources in your workspace
items.content_html:
Tools / Community providers

  • terraform-credentials-vault (⭐5) - A Terraform "credentials helper" plugin that allows providing credentials for Terraform-native services (private module registries, Terraform Cloud, etc) via environment variables.
  • terrastate (⭐78) - Visual Studio Code extension to monitor/deploy/destroy Terraform resources in your workspace

items.title: Awesome Web Archiving
items.content_text:
### Tools & Software / WARC I/O Libraries

*   [FastWARC (⭐111)](https://github.com/chatnoir-eu/chatnoir-resiliparse) - A high-performance WARC parsing library (Python).
items.content_html:
Tools & Software / WARC I/O Libraries

  • FastWARC (⭐111) - A high-performance WARC parsing library (Python).

items.title: Awesome Design Systems
items.content_text:
### Develop isolated components

*   [Backlight](https://backlight.dev/) - Collaborative platform to build Design Systems on the code side. Empower your front-end with an all-in-one solution to manage components. Quick start, speed-up collaboration.
items.content_html:
Develop isolated components

  • Backlight - Collaborative platform to build Design Systems on the code side. Empower your front-end with an all-in-one solution to manage components. Quick start, speed-up collaboration.

items.title: Awesome Plotters
items.content_text:
### Software / G-code

*   [node-gcode (⭐34)](https://github.com/ryansturmer/node-gcode) - Node.js G-code interpreter and simulator.
*   [svg2gcode (⭐55)](https://github.com/em/svg2gcode) - Node.js command line utility for converting SVG to G-code.
*   [svg2gcode (⭐95)](https://github.com/vishpat/svg2gcode) - Python utility for fast SVG to G-code conversion.
*   [jscut](http://jscut.org/) - A web-based utility for converting SVG to G-code.
*   [gcodeplot (⭐182)](https://github.com/arpruss/gcodeplot) - Python utility to convert SVG and HPGL to G-code for a 3-axis CNC machine.
items.content_html:
Software / G-code

  • node-gcode (⭐34) - Node.js G-code interpreter and simulator.
  • svg2gcode (⭐55) - Node.js command line utility for converting SVG to G-code.
  • svg2gcode (⭐95) - Python utility for fast SVG to G-code conversion.
  • jscut - A web-based utility for converting SVG to G-code.
  • gcodeplot (⭐182) - Python utility to convert SVG and HPGL to G-code for a 3-axis CNC machine.

items.title: Awesome Vue
items.content_text:
### Components & Libraries / UI Utilities

*   [vue-use-paginator (⭐18)](https://github.com/Sun0fABeach/vue-use-paginator) - Vue 3 use-hook to reactively paginate data and arrange paginator buttons. Completely renderless.
items.content_html:
Components & Libraries / UI Utilities

  • vue-use-paginator (⭐18) - Vue 3 use-hook to reactively paginate data and arrange paginator buttons. Completely renderless.

items.title: Discount for Student Dev
items.content_text:
### Visual Analytics

*   [AnyChart](https://www.anychart.com/buy/non-commercial-license/) \[FREE] - A flexible JavaScript library for creating interactive charts, maps, and dashboards for visual analytics. Provides students with a free license for use in their education or other non-commercial projects.
items.content_html:
Visual Analytics

  • AnyChart [FREE] - A flexible JavaScript library for creating interactive charts, maps, and dashboards for visual analytics. Provides students with a free license for use in their education or other non-commercial projects.

items.title: Awesome Graphql
items.content_text:
### Tools - Editors & IDEs & Explorers / React

*   [CraftQL (⭐108)](https://github.com/yamafaktory/craftql) - A CLI tool to visualize GraphQL schemas and to output a graph data structure as a graphviz .dot format.
items.content_html:
Tools - Editors & IDEs & Explorers / React

  • CraftQL (⭐108) - A CLI tool to visualize GraphQL schemas and to output a graph data structure as a graphviz .dot format.

items.title: Awesome Preact

*   [Electron TypeScript Preact Boilerplate (⭐5)](https://github.com/yoctopuce-examples/electron-typescript-preact-boilerplate) - Electron starter project with TypeScript and Preact support, powered by esbuild.
items.content_html:
Contents / Boilerplates

  • Electron TypeScript Preact Boilerplate (⭐5) - Electron starter project with TypeScript and Preact support, powered by esbuild.

items.title: Awesome Dataviz
items.content_text:
### JavaScript tools / Charting libraries

*   [GraphicsJS](http://www.graphicsjs.org) - Lightweight JS graphics library with intuitive API, based on SVG/VML.
items.content_html:
JavaScript tools / Charting libraries

items.title: Awesome Sre
items.content_text:
### Books

*   [Four Steps to Creating Effective Game Day Tests](https://shopify.engineering/four-steps-creating-effective-game-day-tests)

### Reliability

*   [Resiliency Planning for High-Traffic Events](https://shopify.engineering/resiliency-planning-for-high-traffic-events)

### Post-Mortem

*   [Inhumanity of Root Cause Analysis](https://www.verica.io/blog/inhumanity-of-root-cause-analysis/)

### Service Level Agreement

*   [SLO tracker](https://slotracker.com/)
*   [SLO Alerting for Mortals](https://ervinbarta.com/2021/10/19/slo-alerting-for-mortals/)
*   [SRE methods and climate change](https://bpetit.nce.re/2021/03/sre-methods-and-climate-change/)
*   [What made SLOs so messy (and what we can do about it)](https://medium.com/lightstephq/what-made-slos-so-messy-and-what-we-can-do-about-it-89be415a80b3)
items.content_html:
Books

  • Four Steps to Creating Effective Game Day Tests

Reliability

  • Resiliency Planning for High-Traffic Events

Post-Mortem

  • Inhumanity of Root Cause Analysis

Service Level Agreement

  • SLO tracker
  • SLO Alerting for Mortals
  • SRE methods and climate change
  • What made SLOs so messy (and what we can do about it)
